description: This file defines a class SDKBuildProject that extends BuildProject to facilitate building and managing SDK projects, including archive download, configuration, installation, and logging operations.

classes.name: SDKBuildProject
classes.description: A class extending BuildProject to manage SDK build processes, including archive handling, configuration, installation, and logging.

methods.name: __init__(self, testpath, sdkenv, uri, testlogdir, builddatetime, foldername=None, dl_dir=None)
methods.description: Initializes an SDKBuildProject instance, setting up directories, paths, and calling the base class constructor.

methods.name: download_archive(self)
methods.description: Downloads and extracts the SDK archive, updating the target directory.

methods.name: run_configure(self, configure_args='', extra_cmds='')
methods.description: Runs the configuration step for the SDK build, passing additional arguments as needed.

methods.name: run_install(self, install_args='')
methods.description: Runs the installation step for the SDK build, setting DESTDIR appropriately.

methods.name: log(self, msg)
methods.description: Writes a message to the log file.

methods.name: _run(self, cmd)
methods.description: Executes a command in a shell environment, logs the command execution, and handles errors.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, testpath, sdkenv, uri, testlogdir, builddatetime,$/
ctags.signature: (self, testpath, sdkenv, uri, testlogdir, builddatetime, foldername=None, dl_dir=None)
